alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 3:31AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL FAYETTE AND EASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES THROUGH 345 AM CST... At 330 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Memphis, or 9 miles west of Germantown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Collierville, Germantown, Millington, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Ellendale, Southeast Memphis, Downtown Memphis, Eads, Frayser, Midtown Memphis, Lenow, Barretville, Redwood, Rosemark, and Capleville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
